metadata.title: CVE-2024-42087 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/panel: ilitek-ili9881c: Fix warning with GPIO controllers that sleepThe ilitek-ili9881c controls the reset GPIO using the non-sleepinggpiod_set_value() function. This complains loudly when the GPIOcontroller needs to sleep. As the caller can sleep, usegpiod_set_value_cansleep() to fix the issue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
